mapper.select: SELECT t1.hospital_nm , t1.hospital_id , t1.hospital_pwd , t1.hospital_type , t1.hospital_tel_no , t1.mgr_tel_no , t1.hospital_addr , t1.hospital_img , t1.hospital_desc , t1.pwd_mdfy_dt , t2.cd_val AS use_yn_nm , t1.gen_by , t1.gen_dt , t1.mdfy_by , t1.mdfy_dt , t1.new_yn , t3.cd_val AS new_yn_nm FROM t_hospital_info t1 INNER JOIN t_cm_cd t2 ON t1.use_yn = t2.cd AND t2.cat_cd = 'HOSPITAL_USE_YN' INNER JOIN t_cm_cd t3 ON t1.new_yn = t3.cd AND t3.cat_cd = 'HOSPITAL_NEW_YN' WHERE 1=1 AND t1.hospital_id = #{hospital_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_hospital_info ( hospital_nm, hospital_id, hospital_pwd, use_yn, gen_by, gen_dt, new_yn ) VALUES ( #{hospital_nm}, #{hospital_id}, #{hospital_pwd}, 'Y'::bpchar, 'admin', now(), 'Y'::bpchar )

INSERT INTO t_hospital_info_hst ( hospital_nm, hospital_id, hospital_pwd, hospital_type, hospital_tel_no, mgr_tel_no, hospital_addr, hospital_img, hospital_desc, pwd_mdfy_dt, use_yn, gen_by, gen_dt, mdfy_by, mdfy_dt, new_yn, last_login, refresh_token) (SELECT hospital_nm, hospital_id, hospital_pwd, hospital_type, hospital_tel_no, mgr_tel_no, hospital_addr, hospital_img, hospital_desc, pwd_mdfy_dt, use_yn, gen_by, gen_dt, mdfy_by, mdfy_dt, new_yn, last_login, refresh_token FROM t_hospital_info WHERE hospital_id = #{hospital_id})
mapper.select: SELECT t1.hospital_id , t1.day_of_week , t2.cd_val AS day_of_week_nm , t1.clinic_yn , t1.c_strt_tm , t1.c_end_tm , t1.lunch_yn , t1.l_strt_tm , t1.l_end_tm FROM t_hospital_clinic_mapp t1 INNER JOIN t_cm_cd t2 ON t1.day_of_week = t2.cd AND t2.cat_cd = 'DOW' WHERE 1=1 AND hospital_id = #{hospital_id}
